mapper.sql: act_goods_id, shop_id, activity_id, goods_type, goods_id, sku_id, deleted, update_user_id, update_time, insert_user_id, insert_time, quantity, buy_max, surplus, act_price
mapper.select: SELECT ag.act_goods_id AS act_goods_id,ag.goods_id AS goods_id,gt.goods_type_name_cn AS goods_name FROM act_goods ag LEFT JOIN gds_type gt ON ag.goods_id = gt.goods_type_id WHERE activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ag.goods_type = '20' AND ag.goods_type_value is NULL ORDER BY ag.insert_time

SELECT ag.act_goods_id AS act_goods_id,ag.goods_id AS goods_id,gb.brand_name AS goods_name FROM act_goods ag LEFT JOIN gds_brand gb ON ag.goods_id = gb.brand_id WHERE activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ag.goods_type = '30' AND ag.goods_type_value is NULL ORDER BY ag.insert_time

SELECT ag.act_goods_id AS act_goods_id,ag.goods_id AS goods_id,gm.goods_code AS goods_code, gm.goods_name AS goods_name FROM act_goods ag LEFT JOIN gds_master gm ON ag.goods_id = gm.goods_id WHERE activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ag.goods_type = '40' AND ag.goods_type_value is NULL ORDER BY ag.insert_time

SELECT ag.act_goods_id AS act_goods_id, ag.goods_id AS goods_id, vos.goods_name AS goods_name, ag.sku_id AS sku_id, vos.color_name AS color_name, vos.size_name AS size_name, vos.goods_code AS goods_code, vos.type AS type, vos.skucontent AS skucontent, ag.quantity AS quantity, ag.buy_max AS buy_max, ag.act_price AS act_price, voss.new_count AS new_count FROM act_goods ag LEFT JOIN view_onsell_sku_new vos ON ag.goods_id = vos.goods_id AND ag.sku_id = vos.skuid LEFT JOIN view_onsell_sku_select voss ON ag.goods_id = voss.goods_id AND ag.sku_id = voss.skuid WHERE activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ag.goods_type = '50' AND ag.goods_type_value is NULL ORDER BY ag.insert_time

SELECT ag.goods_id AS goods_id, vos.goods_name AS goods_name FROM act_goods ag LEFT JOIN view_onsell_sku_new vos ON ag.goods_id = vos.goods_id AND ag.sku_id = vos.skuid WHERE activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ag.goods_type = '50' AND ag.goods_type_value is NULL
select DISTINCT skuid, goods_id from view_onsell_sku_new where is_onsell = '0'

select ag.act_goods_id, sum(osl.quantity) as quantity from act_goods ag inner join act_master acm on ag.activity_id = acm.activity_id inner join act_template act on act.temp_id = acm.temp_id inner join ord_sub_list osl on ag.sku_id = osl.sku_id and osl.goods_id = ag.goods_id and osl.action_id = acm.activity_id where act.actition_type = '11' and osl.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by ag.act_goods_id
select distinct goods_id from act_goods where activity_id in (#{searchIds}) order by goods_id limit #{iDisplayLength,jdbcType=INTEGER} offset #{iDisplayStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(distinct goods_id) from act_goods where activity_id in (#{searchIds})

select goods_id, min(act_price) as act_price, sum(quantity) as quantity, sum(surplus) as surplus from act_goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND activity_id in (#{activityId}) group by goods_id

select master.goods_id,erp.sku from view_erp_goods erp left join gds_master master on erp.goods_code = master.goods_code where erp.brand_code = #{activityGoodsErpBrand} and master.is_onsell = '0' and master.deleted = '0'

select master.goods_id,erp.sku from view_erp_goods erp left join gds_master master on erp.goods_code = master.goods_code where erp.line_code = #{activityGoodsLineCode} and master.is_onsell = '0' and master.deleted = '0'
